# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses a contiguous range of elements.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(bounds: Range<Int>) -> ColumnSlice<WrappedElement> { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **bounds**: A range of valid indices in the column.

## Accessing Elements

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses an element at an index.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a contiguous range of elements with a range expression.
